name: network-monitor-pro
description: Advanced Chrome extension for comprehensive network monitoring with real-time packet analysis, network usage tracking, speed testing, and floating widget overlay - all in one powerful, optimized tool

scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:package
scripts.build:extension: echo 'Building extension...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r manifest.json popup.html popup.js popup.css background.js content.js icons/ dist/ && echo 'Extension built successfully!'
scripts.build:package: cd dist && zip -r ../network-monitor-pro-v2.3.0.zip . && echo 'Package created successfully!'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Build and deploy' && git push origin main

author: Network Monitor Pro Team
